sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, chickpeas, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olives, and feta cheese. 2. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. 3. Sprinkle with dried oregano, salt, and pepper. 4. Toss gently to combine. 5. Serve immediately.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Mediterranean">ac51cb979755021069a3b6fce053af52</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Quinoa (1 cup, cooked), Chickpeas (1 can</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Lunch">617596df9751021069a3b6fce053af66</meal_type> <name>Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl</name> <nutrition>Calories: 400, Protein: 15g, Fat: 20g, Carbs: 45g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Cook quinoa. 2. Prep vegetables and other ingredients.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b0ac87979795021069a3b6fce053af99</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
